title: The Three Amigos
description: In the village there is trouble and only The Three Amigos can save them and serve justice.
quote: We will not die like dogs, we will fight like lions!
altHero: the Three Amigos on horses, hands on their hips
alt1: the Amigos ride in to the city
alt2: a bad guy with epic mustache
alt4: Ned Nederlander holding a big bag of money
